actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Concurrent resolution encouraging maximum use of U.S. Flag Merchant Marine.

summary.text: Declares it is the policy of the United States to encourage the maximum use of United States vessels by individuals and corporations who import and export goods to and from the United States. Directs all Federal agencies which ship, by ocean vessels, any goods or commodities which are paid for of financed by Federal funds to use United States flag vessels to the maximum extent possible.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution encouraging maximum use of U.S. Flag Merchant Marine.
